story.text: Music=Hope Records was created to deliver the power of music to help fight cancer and all proceeds from the sales of the recording fund cancer research.

YOUTUBE VnXadoWT1V0
Ryan Anthony, David Bilger and Michael Sachs perform as solo trumpets in Peter Meechan's moving SONG FOR HOPE, a work that Ryan Anthony wanted to include in the CancerBlows event in March 2015.

SONG FOR HOPE is available on iTunes, Spotify, HD Tracks and all digital download and streaming services

RYAN'S STORY:
Recorded in a studio session in front of a live audience, Ryan wanted to allow the audience a bit of a behind the scenes look into the recording process, while capturing this profound piece of music for the CancerBlows recording. 

Music=Hope Records was created to deliver the power of music to help fight cancer and all proceeds from the sales of the recording fund cancer research.
